mapper.select: SELECT r.*, m.memberId, CASE WHEN r.recommend IS NOT NULL THEN true ELSE false END AS recommend FROM review r JOIN member m ON r.memberNo = m.memberNo WHERE r.bookNo = #{bookNo};

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review WHERE bookNo = #{bookNo} AND recommend = true) AS like_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review WHERE bookNo = #{bookNo}) AS review_count, CONVERT((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review WHERE bookNo = #{bookNo} AND recommend = true) / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review WHERE bookNo = #{bookNo}) * 100, UNSIGNED) AS like_percentage;
SELECT * FROM book ORDER BY bookRelDate DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM book WHERE bookGenre = (SELECT bookGenre FROM book WHERE bookNo = #{bookNo}) ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 10
